h4.AutoAwayIdleTime (int) - (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_AutoAwayIdleTime_GameServerLib]
__CATEGORY Settings that control player idle times that result in player going idle, getting warned, and getting kicked from the game.
Change the autoaway idle time for the server, in seconds.


h4.AwayKickAccessLevel (int) - (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_AwayKickAccessLevel_GameServerLib]
Any players at this access level or below will be considered for away kicking.


h4.AwayKickTime (int) - (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_AwayKickTime_GameServerLib]
Change the afk kick time for the server, in seconds.


h4.AwayKickTime_ProdEditMode (int) - (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_AwayKickTime_ProdEditMode_GameServerLib]
Change the afk kick time for production edit mode server, in seconds.


h4.AwayKickWarnTime (int) - (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_AwayKickWarnTime_GameServerLib]

h4.AwayKickWarnTime_ProdEditMode (int) - (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_AwayKickWarnTime_ProdEditMode_GameServerLib]
